hymn.title: D-A-V-I-D
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—Honor

layout.singingstanza: D -- A -- V -- I -- D, was a skill -- ful shep -- herd boy, (just a boy,) Watch -- ing o -- ver sheep out in the night cold; Seek -- ing for the one who left the sheep -- fold. D -- A -- V -- I -- D, H -- O -- N -- O -- R -- E -- D His God, his folks, his broth -- ers and his coun -- try, too, Da -- vid was the one the Lord had cho -- sen! None of his broth -- ers, but the lit -- tle, sing -- ing, shep -- herd boy: Da -- vid was the one!
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2008 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: D-A-V-I-D, was a skillful shepherd boy, (just a boy,) Watching over sheep out in the night cold; (Brrrr!) Seeking for the one who left the sheepfold. (Ba a-a-a-a-a!) D-A-V-I-D, H-O-N-O-R-E-D His God, his folks, his brothers and his country, too, David was the one the Lord had chosen! None of his brothers, but the little, singing, shepherd boy: David was the one!
